document.full_text: in theory, losing a body part should result in a lower body weight. but some research suggests that having your tonsils removed is associated with weight gain, reports anahad o'connor in today's really? column.
document.title: lose the tonsils, put on pounds?
lines_and_colors: in theory, losing a body part should result in a lower body weight. but some research suggests that having your tonsils removed is associated with weight gain, reports anahad o'connor in today's really? column.
